original_text: All the people were very happy. There was no longer any trouble in Jerusalem now that they had killed Athaliah as her punishment.
korean_text: 그 땅의 모든 백성이 즐거워하고 성중이 평온하더라 아달랴를 무리가 칼로 죽였었더라

sentences.original_text: All the people were very happy.
There was no longer any trouble in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 예루살렘에는 어떤 어려움도 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: now that they had killed Athaliah
